text: It should work automatically with the non-AD methods if it implements the Distributions interface (i.e., `rand` and `logpdf`). For HMC etc. the `logpdf` and in general the constructor has to be differentiable for whatever AD backend you want to use. If it is defined as a subtype of `Distributions.AbstractMvNormal` the identity bijector is defined automatically (not sure if it is also the fallback), otherwise you would have to define `Bijectors.bijector(::MyMvGaussian) = Bijectors.Identity{1}()` IIRC (but <@UHDNY2YMA> is the expert here :slightly_smiling_face:).
